item.title: How to convert .zoom files on MacOS
item.description: Preface It seems like Zoom does no longer allow you to convert the files just by clicking on them. This guide explains how to convert .zoom files on MacOS. Here you can find the guides for Linux and Windows. I’m assuming that you’ve installed the Zoom client using the standard way. Step 1 Open the Terminal app and change to the Zoom-Frameworks folder cd /Applications/zoom.us.app/Contents/Frameworks (you can copy-paste the command from here).
